integration_patterns: Middleware solutions for healthcare data exchange

evidence.claim: NFP uses AWS for cloud infrastructure to support their applications and services.
The company maintains HIPAA compliance for their healthcare solutions.
NFP leverages FHIR standards for interoperability in their health tech offerings.
Integration patterns include API connections and middleware for health data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: Limited evidence of specific X12 transaction use cases or EDI solutions on their site.
